questionnaire.title: Math Education Intake Form (edited)
questionnaire.description: Please fill out this form to help your tutor to understand your needs, strengths, and areas of improvement in math.

questions.question: What grade are you in at school?
What do you think you're really good at in math? (e.g., adding, problem-solving, etc.)
Are there any parts of math that you find tricky or hard to understand? (e.g., fractions, shapes, algebra, etc.)
Have you ever had a tutor or extra help in math before? If yes, what did you like or not like about it?
Do you have any math goals or big tests coming up that you want to prepare for?
How do you feel about math? Do you like it, find it hard, or feel okay about it?
What helps you learn best? Do you like pictures, hands-on activities, using a computer, or something else?
Do you have any difficulties or challenges when learning, like trouble focusing or reading?
How much time do you think you can spend each week working on math?
Do you like learning in person, online, or do you not mind either way?
Do you have everything you need for tutoring, like a computer, internet, or a calculator?
What’s the hardest math problem you’ve ever solved? Do you remember how you solved it?
Do you like working on math alone, or do you prefer doing it with someone?
If you could pick one math topic to learn more about, what would it be?
What do you think makes math fun or interesting?
